bluejam.datastructure

Class UnionFind

  • bluejam.datastructure.UnionFind

  • public class UnionFind

    A disjoint set data structure with path compression and union by size.

    Each element is represented by an index (0-indexed).

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnionFind

        public UnionFind(int n)

        A disjoint set data structure with path compression and union by size.

        Each element is represented by an index (0-indexed).

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()

      • find

        public int find(int x)

        Find a root element of a set x belongs to.

      • unite

        public boolean unite(int x,
                     int y)

        Unite sets contain two elements x and y. If x and y already belong to a same set, nothing happens.

        Returns:
        If x and y belong to a same set, return false.

      • same

        public boolean same(int x,
                    int y)

        Check whether x and y belongs to a same set.

        Returns:
        true if x and y are in a same set.

      • getCardinalityOf

        public long getCardinalityOf(int x)

        Get a size of a set x belongs to.
